message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Delivery Method type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_INVALIDDATERANGE
message.locale: The Date From must be earlier than the Date To.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_INVALIDMOD
message.locale: A Payment Calendar does not exist for "%1s" as it is not supported as a method of delivery.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_PASTDATE
message.locale: An exclusion day in the past cannot be removed from the Payment Calendar.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_BLANKREASON
message.locale: An Exclusion Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIALCALENDAR_FV_PASTDATEINVALID
message.locale: An exclusion day in the past cannot be added to the calendar.
